H0.text: Anatomy. Where are the intercostal muscles situated. Along the Spine

H1.text: Anatomy. Where are the intercostal muscles situated. In the Abdominal Cavity

H2.text: Anatomy. Where are the intercostal muscles situated. Surrounding the Diaphragm

H3.text: Anatomy. Where are the intercostal muscles situated. Between the RIBS

A4.text: The intercostal muscles comprise many different groups of muscles that run between the ribs.

A5.text: The internal intercostal muscles are responsible for the depression of the ribs and bending them inward, thus decreasing the transverse dimensions of the thoracic cavity.
